sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>(Incidental) When looking to purchase illegal, exotic, or black market goods, the character may decrease an item's rarity by one level per rank in Black Market Contacts. For each level an item's rarity is decreased, its cost increases by 50 % of its base cost.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Black Market Contacts</name> <number>TAL0001160</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-10-13 19:36:40</sys_created_on> <sys_id>7595a8d62fbfd090e0f497eef699b6d0</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-10-13 19:39:01</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
